'''Builders & Biomes''' is a free skin pack, that consists of "six skins and three variants"<ref>{{Cite|url=https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/farmer-s-market|website=Minecraft.net|date=October 13, 2020|author=Cristina Anderca|title=Farmer's Market}}</ref> from the board game ''[[Minecraft: Builders & Biomes]]''. A ZIP file containing the skins for ''[[Java Edition]]'' is available for download on [[Minecraft.net]].
